metadata.note: Comprehensive accessibility and disability dataset catalog with local files and external references

disability_demographics.description: U.S. Census Bureau disability demographics and trends

datasets.name: Census Disability Trends 2010-2023 (Raw)
datasets.source: U.S. Census Bureau ACS 1-Year Estimates (S1810 + B18101)
datasets.records: Raw S1810 and B18101 table data
datasets.note: Unprocessed Census tables; see clean version for analysis-ready format

datasets.name: Census Disability Trends 2010-2023 (Clean)
datasets.source: U.S. Census Bureau ACS 1-Year Estimates (S1810 + B18101)
datasets.records: 13 years of annual data
datasets.key_finding: Disability rate rose from 11.9% to 13.6% (+1.7pp)

disability_employment.description: Employment, labor force participation, and economic indicators for people with disabilities

datasets.name: FRED Disability Employment (2009-2024)
datasets.source: Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED), St. Louis Fed
datasets.records: 16 annual data points
datasets.key_finding: Disability employment ratio: 19.2% (2009) to 22.7% (2024), employment gap narrowing from 40pp to 37pp

datasets.name: EEOC ADA Disability Discrimination Charges (1992-2024)
datasets.records: 33 years of annual data, 679,637 total charges
datasets.key_finding: ADA charges peaked at 28,073 in FY 2016; reasonable accommodation is top issue category

datasets.name: JAN Workplace Accommodations Cost & Effectiveness
datasets.source: Job Accommodation Network (JAN), U.S. DOL ODEP
datasets.key_finding: 58.7% of accommodations cost $0; median cost $300; 90% employers report effectiveness

special_education.description: IDEA special education enrollment, disability categories, and inclusion data

datasets.name: IDEA Special Education (Enriched)
datasets.records: 7.5M students, 51 states, 13 disability categories
datasets.key_finding: 15.2% of public school students served; autism grew 8.5x since 2000

web_accessibility.description: Web accessibility compliance, lawsuits, and standards data

datasets.name: ADA Digital Accessibility Lawsuits (2017-2024)
datasets.records: 8 years of annual lawsuit counts
datasets.key_finding: 814 lawsuits (2017) to ~4,000 (2024); 77% target e-commerce

datasets.name: Section 508 Compliance 2024
datasets.key_finding: Only 23% of federal public websites conform; declined from prior year

datasets.name: HTTP Archive Web Accessibility Metrics (2019-2024)
datasets.records: 5 years of annual data, mobile vs desktop comparisons
datasets.key_finding: Alt text adoption grew from 51.8% to 58.5% of images; ARIA usage doubled from 65% to 79% of pages

international_disability.description: Global disability prevalence, health, and policy data

datasets.name: WHO Disability Prevalence & SDG Indicators
datasets.source: WHO, World Bank Health Indicators, UN SDG
datasets.records: SDG disability indicators, World Bank health metrics
datasets.key_finding: 1.3 billion people (16% of world population) live with significant disability

datasets.name: WHO GHO Disability Indicators (DALYs/YLDs 2000-2021)
datasets.key_finding: DALYs and Years Lived with Disability by country, region, disease category

datasets.name: OECD Disability Statistics (34 Countries)
datasets.source: OECD SOCX Database, Disability Work and Inclusion Report, EU-SILC
datasets.records: Prevalence, employment rates, incapacity spending by country
datasets.key_finding: OECD avg: 15% disability prevalence, 34pp employment gap, 2% GDP on incapacity benefits

datasets.name: World Bank Disability-Relevant Indicators (2010-2023)
datasets.source: World Bank Open Data API v2
datasets.records: 4,406 records across 10 socioeconomic indicators
datasets.key_finding: Cross-country data on aging, health spending, employment, literacy, inequality — context for disability analysis

datasets.name: UN CRPD Ratification Status (199 Countries)
datasets.records: Ratification status, dates, Optional Protocol
datasets.key_finding: 190 signatories, 188 ratifications; first binding international disability rights instrument

sign_language.description: ASL and other sign language datasets

datasets.name: WLASL (Word-Level ASL)
datasets.note: Removed from local collection due to licensing restrictions

visual_accessibility.description: Visual impairment and blind user datasets

datasets.name: AAC Vocabulary Data
datasets.access: Various CC licenses (not included - see GlobalSymbols)
datasets.note: Removed from local collection due to mixed licensing

disability_transportation.description: ADA paratransit, accessible transit, and transportation data

datasets.name: NTD ADA Paratransit Data
datasets.source: National Transit Database, Federal Transit Administration
datasets.records: Annual ridership, expenses, ADA compliance, top agencies
datasets.key_finding: 146M paratransit trips (2019 pre-COVID peak); operating cost $40-50/trip vs ~$4 for fixed-route

disability_housing.description: Fair housing, disability discrimination in housing

datasets.name: HUD Fair Housing Disability Complaints
datasets.source: U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD)
datasets.records: 15 years of annual complaints, state breakdowns, issue types
datasets.key_finding: Disability is #1 basis for fair housing complaints (~55%); failure to provide reasonable accommodation is top issue

disability_healthcare.description: Medicaid, Medicare, healthcare access, and mental health for people with disabilities

datasets.name: CMS Medicaid Disability Enrollment
datasets.records: 49 national records, 321 state ABD records, 84 monthly trends, 10,300 state monthly records
datasets.key_finding: 10.2M aged/blind/disabled Medicaid enrollees; ABD enrollees are 15% of Medicaid but drive ~45% of spending

datasets.name: SAMHSA Mental Health Prevalence & Treatment
datasets.source: SAMHSA National Survey on Drug Use and Health (NSDUH)
datasets.records: Prevalence, treatment, unmet need by demographics
datasets.key_finding: 23.1% of adults had any mental illness (2023); 37% with SMI received no treatment

disability_government.description: SSA disability determinations, VA compensation, government benefits administration

datasets.name: SSA State Agency Disability Workload
datasets.records: State-level determination data, approval rates, processing times
datasets.key_finding: Initial approval rate ~33%; 13-month average processing time; significant interstate variation

datasets.name: SSA SSDI/SSI Annual Statistics
datasets.source: SSA DI Annual Statistical Report, SSI Annual Statistical Report, OACT Statistics
datasets.records: SSDI beneficiaries, SSI recipients, awards, benefit amounts by year
datasets.key_finding: 7.3M disabled-worker SSDI beneficiaries; 4.9M SSI blind/disabled recipients; $173B+ annual benefits

datasets.name: VA Disability Compensation & Claims
datasets.records: Claims by state, compensation rates, veteran population, processing data
datasets.key_finding: 5.7M+ veterans receive VA disability compensation; 1.6M pending claims

disability_technology_research.description: Assistive technology patents and research papers

datasets.name: WIPO Assistive Technology Patents
datasets.records: 1,325 assistive technology patents (1985-2026)
datasets.key_finding: Massive growth: 10 patents (2010-2014) to 519 (2020-2024); top IPC classes: prostheses (A61F), hearing devices (H04R), computing (G06F)

disability_education.description: Civil rights data on students with disabilities beyond IDEA

datasets.name: CRDC Section 504 & Disability Data
datasets.source: Civil Rights Data Collection (CRDC), U.S. Dept. of Education
datasets.records: Section 504 enrollment, restraint/seclusion, discipline disparities, course access by state
datasets.key_finding: Students with disabilities face 2-3x higher suspension rates; 81% of restraint/seclusion incidents involve students with disabilities
